title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1587/94 of 30 June 1994 establishing the supply balance for the Canary Islands in products of the pigmeat sector for the first quarter of the 1994/95 marketing year and amending Regulation (EEC) No 1724/92
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1587/94 of 30 June 1994 establishing the supply balance for the Canary Islands in products of the pigmeat sector for the first quarter of the 1994/95 marketing year and amending Regulation (EEC) No 1724/92
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I, and III of Regulation (EEC) No 1724/92 are replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 180, 23. 7. 1993, p. 26.
(3) OJ No L 179, 1. 7. 1992, p. 90.
(4) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1994, p. 1.
